sentences.en: Actually, it's not unusual to use'dynamite'as an adjective in this way.
sentences.cn: 事实上, ‘ dynamite ’ 作为形容词经常这么用哦.

sentences.en: And you found that loves a barrell dynamite!
sentences.cn: 你还觉得爱就是一桶火药阿!

sentences.en: Fifty yards of track was blown up with dynamite.
How much dynamite do you have to set off in your ears before your head clears?
sentences.cn: 我们到底要怎么样说你才听得进去?

sentences.en: I want some more of your dynamite stewed beef, please.
sentences.cn: 请再给我一些你们那种美味可口的炖牛肉.

sentences.en: Rescuers are ready to dynamite Tangjiashan barrier lake.
sentences.cn: 救援者已准备好炸破唐家山堰塞湖.
那则新闻报导引起极大震动.

sentences.en: That teenager singer is really dynamite!
sentences.cn: 那个少年歌手真是轰动一时!

sentences.en: The three actors in this movie are box office dynamite.
sentences.cn: 这三名演员是影片的票房保证.

sentences.en: Their new album is really dynamite.
sentences.cn: 他们这套新唱片一下子轰动起来.
这些主张在政治上是极其危险的.

sentences.en: Wow, that new car be dynamite!
sentences.cn: 呵, 那辆新车真是太棒了.

sentences.en: Yet once more , Torres was dynamite whenever he was fit.
sentences.cn: 一旦他是健康的, 他就能攻城拔寨.

words.tran_cn: 炸药；具有潜在危险的人（或物）

trans.tran_cn: 炸药，具有爆炸性的事物，有潜在危险的人，引起轰动的人(或物
trans.tran_en: a powerful explosive used especially for breaking rock
to damage or destroy something with dynamite
